title: Project Tour de France: Inside Quick-Step’s ‘Full Transformation’ for Remco Evenepoel
content:
'We'll always be important in the classics, but we’re making a transformation for grand tours': The Wolfpack shifts identity for Evenepoel's bold ambitions.

Read the full article at Project Tour de France: Inside Quick-Step’s ‘Full Transformation’ for Remco Evenepoel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
